display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cXVkDhAeaE8Q7kNvwHLWsMx&_nc_oc=Adni9t8FERFCvIr3qpe_F7SYdQos4YmOOuFQv4i7a3Ys_GzibIEppH59r9LeY-B_BW0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qoG1JNHG_ALG3I-0zWpoTw&oh=00_Aflq6qU3egsbBElB22R3LMHbHzALnYV5qui1ICz6iai7zw&oe=6958765D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-k-AREeULbQQ7kNvwEeKFne&_nc_oc=Adk1enH8-d-eqcT6U86YRTtR2RAw_S_lkNhLX2NTeHpVZ-uljiY0aw76IQXMDsj7vL8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qoG1JNHG_ALG3I-0zWpoTw&oh=00_AfnI8IhYg461CqJqmqJff0xH8S8lx0xN_kJez5nl0VLL7Q&oe=69589052)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RKBDdZZD2LoQ7kNvwF3HDDl&_nc_oc=Adkm6hHKXZtfV8uNEe-nFk22ldUCrzV4gFS8ENo4Y1j3iGQgZJUMsGDjv745vJgIKrg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qoG1JNHG_ALG3I-0zWpoTw&oh=00_AfmGbhejqZZJVC2OoobSpKs0nBc3YkGwawuMC-qp7mHOtg&oe=69585E23)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=w271KdUYc4sQ7kNvwHKDxNv&_nc_oc=AdngHzozIuRH5MQUpP1vuFInGs_H6ugnilsOn_T6CFEZW7Y3SVGQOphOSH5Cdkyy1H0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qoG1JNHG_ALG3I-0zWpoTw&oh=00_Afnt3RYUhzukep1oFd0CUl3t9oJcpvWRxVma2rbBgP_CaA&oe=69588CEE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=tvMgVL-FT4sQ7kNvwGk5MB1&_nc_oc=AdmrzWl04uI49VPLfuRGMqWf-qgSJ7mJMWs-M-I3_QECU3-yY1kO8pTUVioTEdGMwGE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qoG1JNHG_ALG3I-0zWpoTw&oh=00_Afksh5J8CtSgWIQNXfKORDSqZRY1wtopvOr_BxHKYdx0Tg&oe=69585C96)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
